original_text: So he went back to him and found him standing beside his offering, with all the Moabite officials.
korean_text: 그가 발락에게로 돌아간즉 발락과 모압의 모든 고관이 번제물 곁에 함께 섰더라

sentences.original_text: So he went back to him
and found him standing beside his offering
sentences.korean_translation: 그리고 그가 자신의 제물 곁에 서 있는 것을 발견했다
